resources.string: Noise cannot sync over Bluetooth because Bluetooth LE beacons are not supported on this device.
Enable Bluetooth to let Noise send and receive messages.
Copy the Bluetooth hardware address into Noise\'s settings to send and receive messages.
Bluetooth is on. Noise will now send and receive messages in the background.
Bluetooth is off. Noise will not be able to send or receive messages.
Required to send and receive messages over Bluetooth
The hardware Bluetooth address is needed to send and receive messages over Bluetooth. Copy this from Android Settings -> System -> About Phone -> Status -> Bluetooth address.
Username must be between 5 and 31 characters
Before you can send and receive private messages, Noise needs to generate and sign a key pair. This might take a minute.
